title: BLM Shoots Cops over FALSE Breonna Taylor Narrative!
description: Steven looks at the nationwide riots and violence over the Breonna Taylor verdict, then reveals how the key “facts” in the #BlackLivesMatter narrative are false. Then he debunks the Left’s false claim that Trump won’t concede the election if he loses and shows how the Democrats are actually setting the stage for a concession refusal from Biden. Last, we look at the strange tic Biden uses to cover for his gaffes.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
